tool_description: Utilize 260+ Microsoft Excel functions to perform calculations and logical operations directly in your program by calling this simple API.
name: Excel Formula
title: Excel Formula

api_list.name: getExcelFormulaResult
api_list.description: Runs a computation of the provided Excel Formula, through formula parameter, and returns the result.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://excel-formula.p.rapidapi.com/execute"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "excel-formula.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://excel-formula.p.rapidapi.com/execute"

print(response.json())
